title: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C)
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface
Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough
Add torn mozzarella pieces
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden
Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description: Colorful and nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and tahini dressing
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast chickpeas and diced sweet potato at 400°F for 25 minutes
Massage kale with lemon juice and olive oil
Make tahini dressing with tahini, lemon, water, and garlic
Arrange quinoa, vegetables, and avocado in bowls
Drizzle with tahini dressing

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Quick Asian-style stir-fry with tender chicken and crisp vegetables
steps: Slice chicken into thin strips
Heat sesame oil in wok over high heat
Cook chicken until browned, about 5 minutes
Add minced ginger and garlic, cook 1 minute
Add vegetables and stir-fry 5 minutes
Add soy sauce and toss to coat
Serve over steamed rice

title: Gluten-Free Salmon with Asparagus
description: Healthy baked salmon with lemon and roasted asparagus
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Place salmon and asparagus on baking sheet
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Season with minced garlic, dill, salt, and pepper
Bake for 15-18 minutes until salmon flakes easily
Serve with lemon wedges

title: Beef Tacos
description: Flavorful Mexican street-style tacos with seasoned ground beef
steps: Brown ground beef in skillet over medium heat
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer 5 minutes
Warm tortillas in dry skillet
Fill tortillas with beef
Top with diced onion, cilantro, and tomatoes
Squeeze lime juice over tacos and serve

title: Thai Green Curry
description: Creamy and aromatic Thai curry with vegetables and coconut milk
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions
Heat curry paste in large pot for 1 minute
Add coconut milk and bring to simmer
Add cubed tofu and vegetables
Simmer 15 minutes until vegetables tender
Stir in thai basil and lime leaves
Serve over jasmine rice

title: Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into 1/4 inch rounds
Arrange alternating slices on serving platter
Tuck basil leaves between slices
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar
Season with salt and pepper
Let sit 10 minutes before serving

title: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty and comforting soup packed with protein and vegetables
steps: Dice carrots, celery, and onion
Sauté vegetables in pot until softened
Add minced garlic and spices, cook 1 minute
Add lentils and broth, bring to boil
Reduce heat and simmer 30-35 minutes
Remove bay leaf and serve hot

title: Greek Chicken Souvlaki
description: Marinated chicken skewers with tzatziki sauce
steps: Cut chicken into 1-inch cubes
Marinate in lemon juice, olive oil, oregano, and garlic for 20 minutes
Make tzatziki: mix yogurt, grated cucumber, garlic, and dill
Thread chicken onto skewers
Grill or broil 10-12 minutes, turning once
Serve in pita with tzatziki and vegetables

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish with savory mushrooms and parmesan
steps: Heat broth in saucepan and keep warm
Sauté sliced mushrooms in butter until golden
In separate pot, sauté onion and garlic
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes
Add wine and stir until absorbed
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
After 20 minutes, stir in mushrooms and parmesan

title: Quinoa Black Bean Burrito Bowl
description: Protein-packed Mexican-inspired bowl with quinoa, beans, and fresh toppings
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Sauté bell peppers until softened
Heat black beans with cumin and chili powder
Arrange quinoa in bowls as base
Top with beans, corn, peppers, and avocado
Garnish with cheese, sour cream, cilantro, and lime

title: Pad Thai
description: Classic Thai noodle dish with tamarind sauce and peanuts
steps: Soak rice noodles in hot water until softened
Make sauce: mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar
Stir-fry shrimp in wok until pink
Push shrimp aside, scramble eggs
Add drained noodles and sauce, toss to coat
Add bean sprouts and scallions, cook 2 minutes
Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges

title: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layered Italian casserole with breaded eggplant, marinara, and cheese
steps: Slice eggplant into 1/2 inch rounds
Dip in beaten eggs, then breadcrumbs
Fry in olive oil until golden on both sides
Layer fried eggplant in baking dish with marinara and mozzarella
Sprinkle with parmesan and basil
Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes until bubbly

title: Coconut Curry Chickpeas
description: Warming vegan curry with chickpeas in creamy coconut sauce
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in oil
Add curry powder and cook until fragrant
Add diced tomatoes and coconut milk
Stir in drained chickpeas
Simmer 15 minutes
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Serve over basmati rice

title: Honey Garlic Glazed Chicken
description: Sweet and savory chicken with sticky honey garlic sauce
steps: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper
Sear in hot skillet until golden, about 5 minutes per side
Remove chicken and set aside
In same pan, mix honey, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger
Return chicken to pan and simmer in sauce 10 minutes
Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions

title: Mediterranean Falafel Bowl
description: Crispy chickpea falafel with fresh vegetables and tahini sauce
steps: Pulse chickpeas, herbs, garlic, and spices in food processor
Form mixture into small patties
Fry falafel in oil until golden and crispy
Make tahini sauce with tahini, lemon juice, and water
Dice cucumber and tomatoes for salad
Serve falafel over greens with vegetables and tahini sauce

title: Butternut Squash Soup
description: Velvety smooth soup with roasted butternut squash and warming spices
steps: Peel and cube butternut squash
Roast squash at 400°F for 30 minutes
Sauté onion and garlic until softened
Add roasted squash and broth
Simmer 10 minutes
Blend until smooth with immersion blender
Stir in coconut milk, cinnamon, nutmeg, and maple syrup

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Classic Italian-American dish with shrimp in buttery garlic sauce
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions
Sauté minced garlic in butter until fragrant
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3 minutes
Add white wine and lemon juice, simmer 2 minutes
Toss cooked pasta with shrimp and sauce
Garnish with fresh parsley and red pepper flakes

title: Korean Bibimbap
description: Colorful Korean rice bowl with vegetables, egg, and gochujang sauce
steps: Cook rice and keep warm
Marinate sliced beef in soy sauce and sesame oil
Blanch spinach and bean sprouts separately
Sauté carrots and mushrooms until tender
Cook beef until browned
Fry eggs sunny-side up
Arrange rice in bowls, top with vegetables, beef, and egg
Serve with gochujang sauce on the side
